snippet: Fisker, the maker of plug-in hybrid electric cars, blames its bankruptcy on another suitor, a mainland Chinese firm.
lead_paragraph: Fisker, the maker of plug-in hybrid electric cars, blames its bankruptcy on another suitor, a mainland Chinese firm.

headline.main: Automaker Seeks Approval of Sale to Hong Kong Tycoon
headline.print_headline: Automaker Asks Approval of Sale to Hong Kong Tycoon
